mapper.sql: userID, name, password, roleID, sex, birthday, dutyID, workplace, createdate, createuser, updatedate, updateuser, deletedate, deleteuser, state, email, mobilephone, telephone, organID, ext1, ext2, ext3, ext4, ext5, ext6, ext7, ext8
mapper.select: select u.userID, u.name, u.password, u.roleID, u.sex, u.birthday, u.dutyID, u.workplace, u.createdate, u.createuser, u.updatedate, u.updateuser, u.deletedate, u.deleteuser, u.state, u.email, u.mobilephone, u.telephone, u.organID, u.ext1, u.ext2, u.ext3, u.ext4, u.ext5, u.ext6, u.ext7, u.ext8,(select r.role_name from tb_role r where r.role_id=u.roleID) as roleName from tb_user u
